name: Devastate 3
script:
if matches[2] == "arms" then
  wsys.restobreakcheck("mangledrightarm")
  wsys.restobreakcheck("mangledleftarm")
elseif matches[2] == "legs" then
  wsys.restobreakcheck("mangledrightleg")
  wsys.restobreakcheck("mangledleftleg")
end
matches: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ unleashes a bone crushing blow with .+ at your (legs|arms), pulverising meat and bone in a single strike\.$
^With calculated precision, [A-Z][a-z]+ unleashes a mighty blow at your (arms|legs), shattering bone and pulping flesh\.$
